statements: SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100000;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_date FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT property_id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM real_estate_transactions ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT buyer_name, seller_name FROM real_estate_transactions ORDER BY buyer_name, seller_name;
SELECT transaction_id, property_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount, contract FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 50000;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_date FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE seller_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE buyer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, transaction_date FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE seller_id = 100;
SELECT contract_id, property_id, contract_type FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Rental Agreement';
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT seller_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM real_estate_transactions GROUP BY seller_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT transaction_id, property_id, seller_id FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE buyer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, COUNT(*) FROM real_estate_transactions GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;

SELECT seller_id, property_id FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE seller_id = 201 AND property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Rental') ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT contract_id, property_id, contract_type, contract_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-02-01' ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties WHERE price > 50000;
SELECT property_id, property_name, price, location FROM properties WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, payment_amount FROM contracts JOIN payments ON contracts.contract_id = payments.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM properties WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.property_name, c.buyer_name, c.seller_name, c.contract_date FROM properties p JOIN contracts c ON p.property_id = c.property_id WHERE c.buyer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM properties ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_properties;
SELECT property_name, price FROM real_estate_properties WHERE price > 500000;
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, address, price FROM real_estate_properties ORDER BY price DESC, property_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe' AND contract_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY contract_date DESC
SELECT property_name, price FROM real_estate_properties WHERE price > 500000 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE buyer_name <> seller_name ORDER BY contract_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM RealEstateProperties;
SELECT property_id, address, price, square_feet FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE square_feet > 2000;
SELECT address, square_feet FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE price >= 50000 ORDER BY square_feet DESC;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email FROM Clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, commission_rate FROM Agents ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM RealEstateProperties;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT address, square_feet, price FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE square_feet > 2000 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, Clients.full_name, RealEstateProperties.address, Transactions.transaction_amount FROM Transactions INNER JOIN Clients ON Transactions.client_id = Clients.client_id INNER JOIN RealEstateProperties ON Transactions.property_id = RealEstateProperties.property_id ORDER BY Transactions.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT Agents.agent_name, SmartContracts.contract_text FROM Agents LEFT JOIN SmartContracts ON Agents.agent_id = SmartContracts.property_id WHERE Agents.commission_rate > 0.05;
